alert.note: Alert for Gila (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 04 at 10:36PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Tonto Creek remains above action stage with elevated flow as a result of excessive rainfall and runoff. * WHERE...A portion of east central Arizona, including the following county, Gila. * WHEN...Until 500 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1035 PM MST, the Tonto Creek stream gauge remains above action stage with the latest stream gauge reporting 4.46 feet. Based on the current rate of decline, water levels will be near or falling below action stage by Wednesday evening. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Tonto Basin. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
